This is an example change catalog item set in place by Solarwinds.

\n

We are starting to hit the limit on what our email server is able to handle. We need to add another email server to load balance the effort. 

", "state": "Approved", "change_plan": "
    \n
  • Spin up a new VM to host email server
    • \n
  • Install email server
    • \n
  • Connect new email server to old email server
    • \n
  • Migrate db to central location
    • \n
  • Setup load balance
    • \n
  • Implement Spam Experts (https://www.spamexperts.com/)
    • \n
", "rollback_plan": "

Move full operations back to the old server

", "test_plan": "

  • Confirm emails are not lost
    • \n
  • Confirm you can send and receive emails
    • \n
\n
